## An important trade-off​

We know that the best decisions are made with the best information available.

<p align="center">
<img src="hierarchy.jpg" alt="Hierarchys" width="300"/>
</p>

But ...​

-   Sometimes the best information is located at specialist staff lower down in the hierarchy.
-   If important, that information should reach the C-suite.
